long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover an effective way to manage and organize your prompts with the “Prompts Wizard” extension for ChatGPT. This tool has been meticulously designed for ChatGPT users, providing quick and organized access to all your favorite and frequently used prompts, right from your Chrome browser.

----------

Highlighted Features:

1️⃣ Quick Prompt Saving:

- Save any prompt in an instant while interacting with ChatGPT.
- Organize your prompts individually or in groups.

2️⃣ Efficient Search:

- Search and access your prompts quickly.
- Filter your searches by the prompt name.

3️⃣ Automatic Insertion:

- Easily insert any saved prompt into the ChatGPT window, using the “/” command. Save time and effort.

4️⃣ Sequential Prompt Saving:

- Save prompts in a specific sequence to maintain the conversation flow.
- Visualize and access the prompt sequence, knowing exactly in which order they should be used.

5️⃣ Editing and Management:

- Edit, delete, or rearrange your prompts at any time with a user-friendly and easy-to-use interface.

----------

With “Prompts Wizard”, transform your ChatGPT experience, making it more seamless, organized, and productive. This extension is an indispensable resource for any ChatGPT enthusiast or professional looking to maximize efficiency and organization in their interactions. Download “Prompts Wizard” today and discover a revolutionary way to interact with ChatGPT.
